mailServer.name: Mirai Technologies
mailServer.email: Alright, I'll give you access to my computer. Make sure the information on Makise stays private. Username is my first name. Password is my wife's name. I'm trusting that you don't share this with anyone. -Luther
That was a success. We should do it again sometime.
I'd like to request information on Makise. There's something that's been bothering me. -Gerald
